segment.target: Number of times you have caught Schrödinger.
Number of coffees taken from the machine.
Doors you have repaired with TLC.
Number of times you have explored a planet and come back alive.
Number of planets you have discovered.
Number of fires you have reported.
Number of fires you have extinguished.
Missions you have delegated which have been accepted.
Food brought back from expeditions. You must have survived...
Number of damaged pieces of equipment you have reported.
Number of times you have been gagged.
Number of return trips made to Sol. How was the trip?
Number of cycles spent honoring the SDF
You have lived as a pawn of the Federation. It's time to change teams!
Number of cycles won playing as the chief
You were the captain of the Daedalus, so... how did it feel? All-powerful?
Number of cycles you've spent providing blood samples
You lived in the body of the most popular of human guinea pigs, although this wasn't exactly the type of celebrity you dreamed of becoming!
Number of cycles won contemplating your work
You were the designer of the Daedalus, so... how did you feel? Proud?
Number of cycles spent taking stuff out
You have been a galactic sharp-shooter, are you still as trigger-happy?
Keep your friends close, and your enemies closer.
If you're asking the question, Doctor Caliber has the answer.
If any of you move, I will execute every last one of you!
Number of turns spent counting your cash
Being a billionaire is a dream on Earth... But in space, with a Mush on board...
There's nothing for people like you round here!
There's cash to be made here, I can smell it!
The guy's worth 3 billion and change!
Number of cycles spent fixing your barnet fair
You've been bopping round the corridors to the rhythm of disco-pop, it's a shame this costume doesn't have sequins...
Number of cycles examining the infinitely small
You were a renowned scientist, could you be persuaded to refute that for a tasty bonus?
What on earth am I doing?
Number of cycles spent sulking in a corner
You lived as a brilliant engineer, and those who underestimated you regret it bitterly!
Title uniquely awarded to survivors of the Daedalus who reached Eden, the promised land.
Founder of the Order of Eden
You have contributed to eMush development and with your help, it has evolved. Thank you!
“I could totally put this on a CV…“
Number of cycles won reading the cards
You were the navigator of the Daedalus, so... how did it feel? Dizzying?
After the nebula, take a right
Number of cycles spent having close encounters of the third kind
You were a legendary explorer, how did it go... were you disappointed not to have 3 eyes?
You don't exactly look like a lucky charm!
The epic voyages of Jiang Hua
Number of cycles spent cultivating psychotropic plants
You were once a nature lover, at the end of your days you'll surely make good fertilizer.
She likes a little, a lot...
Is that a banana in your pocket!
Number of cycles won... listening to others
You were the psychologist of the Daedalus, so... how did you feel? Mad?
In the eyes, I read it in your eyes!
Number of cycles spent cooking up suspect dishes
Lesson 1, Act 1 : Where is Stephen ? Stephen is ... in the kitchen !
Number of cycles spent as an intergalactic Don Juan
You lived as a self-proclaimed intergalactic super hero, and those who mocked you will be reminded of it one day!
Number of cycles spent surfing the lowest frequencies
You have been an intrepid system rebel, nothing and nobody can distract you from the truth!
Number of cycles spent stroking your cat
Yeah, nobody pretends to understand a single word you say, maybe now would be a good time to come back to the land of the mortals.
Number of cycles won running round in circles
You were the most feared hunter aboard the Daedalus... In saying that, there weren't that many hunters...
Number of trips you have completed without sleep. This trophy is only awarded if you survive beyond day 6.
Number of cycles spent fungifying in a dark corner
Bright eyes and a bushy skin?!
Title reserved for Mushs who have infested Eden, the contaminated land!
Number of speeches you have given in front of at least eight spectators.
Number of hunters you have defeated.
Number of times you were appreciated during a game.
Number of surgical procedures you carried out successfully.
Number of surgical procedures you failed.
During one of your trips, your crew successfully completed a series of legendary tasks from the communications center.
Number of times you reached day 5.
Number of times you reached day 10.
Number of times you reached day 15.
Number of times you reached day 20.
Number of times you reached day 30.
During one of your voyages, your team solved the Mush enigma.
Number of rebel bases you personally contacted.
Number of trips on which you've managed to get PILGRED back online.
Number of days of your longest voyage aboard the Daedalus.
If Today Was Your Last Day
Little treats you've helped yourself to!
The ship's crew has managed to contact Kivanç Terzi.
The crew has contacted Nils Carlsson.
Your team decoded all rebel transmissions during a voyage.
Number of times that the Plasma shield has been used by your crew during a journey.
Number of grenades used by your team on expeditions.
Mush brought down by your very own hands!
